title: Summoner Icon Gifting Gone?
body: Has the ability of gifting summoner icons always been a season thing or?

replies.body: There's currently an issue with gifting icons, and is disabled for the moment.  We'll be providing updates on this in our[ service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page.  Once it's resolved, gifting icons should become available as normal!
Please fix it soon, I need to gift world icons to my friends
Still not up after 2 MONTHS, I hope this gets fixed soon cause I still want to gift one of the Worlds Icons to my friend before its gone.
wtf i could have sworn you used to be able to gift summoner icons zz
